title: Piccolo Della Mama
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Indian, Italian, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A little takeaway hut serving Italian-style pizza and pasta and various Indian dishes. A vegan section of the Indian menu offers many dishes. There is a picnic bench at the hatch where you order and you can watch your food being prepared.
